abstract.p: Shiren Moore is named president of Communicator Marketing Worldwide, succeeding Jay Farrell, who remains chairman; James C Magill Jr is named president at San Francisco office of Corsi Agency, succeeding Marc Corsi, who remains chairman and chief executive; Gail Heimann is named to new post of partner and president at BSMG Worldwide; DanaRoot is named to head Y&L Interactive, new digital unit of Young & Laramore; Christopher Santee is named director of new media unit of Len Dugow & Associates; Dave Pappas is named interactive director at new interactive unit of Syntax Communication Group; Rob Dircks is named to head new Web division at Dircks Associates (Advertising column) (S)

block.p: * Shireen Moore, executive vice president for account services at Communicator Marketing Worldwide, Chicago, part of Lighthouse Global Network, was named president, succeeding Jay Farrell, who remains chairman. * James C. Magill Jr. was named president at the San Francisco office of the Corsi Agency, succeeding Marc Corsi, who remains chairman and chief executive. Mr. Magill had been executive vice president at Zuckerman Fernandes & Partners, San Francisco. * Gail Heimann, a partner and chief creative officer at BSMG Worldwide, New York, part of True North Communications, was named to the new post of partner and president at the global consumer marketing practice. * Dana Root was named to head Y&L Interactive, a new digital unit of Young & Laramore, Indianapolis, as director for interactive creative. She had been creative director at Gabriel Interactive, Indianapolis. * Christopher Santee was named director of a new media unit of Len Dugow & Associates, New York. He was general partner at @Sanix.com, New York, a technology consultancy. * Dave Pappas was named interactive director at a new interactive unit of the Syntax Communication Group, West Sayville, N.Y. He had been art director at Erin/Edwards Communications, Glen Head, N.Y. * Rob Dircks, a partner at Dircks Associates, St. James, N.Y., was named to head a new Web division.
